A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Best Star Wars Film by far. Fanatics will complain about the film not re-creating a feeling they had 40 years ago\, wanting the same only different\, yet nag when they get it. \nGreat character arcs\, plot twists you don't see coming (finally!) and even though it has a little too much of those Porgs\, absolutely the Star Wars Film I've been waiting for!
